name: odyssey-voyage-i-lab
description: Welcome to Voyage I Lab! In this hands-on project we'll take the companion app of Odyssey Voyage I, FlyBy, and update it to use Apollo Federation v2! You can find the [course lessons and instructions in Odyssey](https://odyssey.apollographql.com/voyage-i-lab), Apollo's learning platform.

scripts.publish: echo 'Enter APOLLO_GRAPH_REF:' && read graphRef && echo 'Enter subgraph name:' && read subgraph && rover subgraph publish $graphRef --name $subgraph --schema ./subgraph-$subgraph/$subgraph.graphql
